description:
The BIC Soleil Sensitive Advanced razor features 5 flexible blades that adjust to your curves to deliver a flawlessly smooth shave. The BIC Soleil Sensitive Advanced razor also features 360Â° water activated moisture strips for an enhanced glide. The pivoting head and rubber handle provide added control while the enhanced Comfort Shield helps protect against irritation.

- Enhanced Comfort Shield helps protect against irritation
- Five flexible blades for a close and efficient shave
- Pivoting head and rubber handle for added control
- Water activated moisture strips for enhanced glide
- Enriched with Aloe
name: Bic Soleil Sensitive Advanced Disposable Razors 2 pack
